description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Slider component.

disabled.description: Specifies whether the Slider component is disabled.
disabled.label: Disabled

label.description: The label for the Slider component.
label.label: Label

max.description: The maximum value for the Slider component.
max.label: Minimum

min.description: The minimum value for the Slider component.
min.label: Minimum

showNumber.description: Indicates whether the value of the Slider should be visible.
showNumber.label: Show Number

step.description: The incremental step value for the Slider component.
step.label: Step

value.description: The value for the Slider component.
value.label: Value

vertical.description: Indicates whether the Slider component is vertical oriented.
vertical.label: Vertical
